ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We would like to acknowledge Jonathan Webb, Rowena Morris, and Phil Craven for providing us with access to fire trails in Dharawal and Morton National Parks. We thank Michael L. Logan and the other anonymous reviewers for their helpful comments and suggestions that helped us to improve an earlier version of the manuscript.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This work was supported by University of Johannesburg [to B.S.B.].

sec.title: Supplementary material
sec.p: Supplementary material can be found at https://academic.oup.com/cz.
